title: Apple releases new firmware update for AirTag item trackers
content:
Seven months after releasing AirTag’s latest firmware update, Apple is now seeding a new version to owners of the item tracker. Here’s what you need to know about this new version.

more…

The post Apple releases new firmware update for AirTag item trackers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Seven months after releasing AirTag's latest firmware update, Apple is now seeding a new version to owners of the item tracker.
